alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Lapeer; Livingston; Macomb; Oakland; Sanilac; Shiawassee; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 01 at 8:38PM EST until February 03 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM WEDNESDAY TO 7 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 13 inches. * WHERE...Sanilac, Shiawassee, Genesee, Lapeer, St. Clair, Livingston, Oakland and Macomb Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM Wednesday to 7 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change over to snow overnight. Snow and falling temperatures on Wednesday will lead to snow covered and slick roads. Peak snowfall will be late Wednesday morning and afternoon, with rates up to an inch per hour at times. Snow will taper off Wednesday night. Gusty north winds Wednesday afternoon and evening may lead to some blowing and drifting snow and poor visibilities.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Genesee; Lapeer; Livingston; Macomb; Oakland; Sanilac; Shiawassee; St. Clair
